original_text: That happened in the ninth month of the fifth year that Jehoiakim ruled Judah as king. People from all Judah's towns had come to Jerusalem. They joined with the people of Jerusalem to fast and pray in the Lord's temple.
korean_text: 유다의 요시야 왕의 아들 여호야김의 제오년 구월에 예루살렘 모든 백성과 유다 성읍들에서 예루살렘에 이른 모든 백성이 여호와 앞에서 금식을 선포한지라

sentences.original_text: That happened in the ninth month
that Jehoiakim ruled Judah as king
People from all Judah's towns had come to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 모든 고을 사람들이 예루살렘에 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: They joined with the people of Jerusalem
